1.output: Speak("I am doing absolutely fantastic, thank you for asking. What can I do for you today?")

LightOn()
Speak("The lights have been turned on, sir.")

LightOff()
Speak("The lights have been turned off sir.")

Speak("Tony Stark, also known as Iron Man, is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics.  A self-described genius, billionaire, playboy, and philanthropist, he is the president and CEO of Stark Industries. Stark is a brilliant inventor and industrialist who suits up as the armored superhero Iron Man. Do you want to know more about him? ")

Speak("Mark Filler, commonly known as Markiplier, is a popular YouTuber known for his comedic Let's Play videos, especially of survival horror and indie games. Do you want to know more about him or watch one of his videos?.")

Speak("Opening Youtube, Instagram and Chrome for you. What are we up to today, boss?")
webbrowser.open("https://www.youtube.com")
webbrowser.open("https://www.instagram.com")
webbrowser.open("https://www.google.com")

Speak("Already on it, boss! Opening Amazon's finest socks collection for your feet-fashion needs. Anything else you need while I'm at it?")
webbrowser.open("https://www.amazon.in/s?k=socks")
